snippet: The iPhone 5 that Apple introduced last week with only incremental changes seemed to signal that the smartphone industry has entered an era of technological bunny hops.
abstract: Apple's iPhone 5, introduced with only incremental changes, seems to signal that the smartphone industry has entered an era of technological bunny hops; refinements lack the breathtaking impact the first iPhone had in 2007, but incremental improvements can add up over years; breakthroughs in materials and software could lead to substantial changes in how they look and function in the future.
lead_paragraph: The iPhone 5 that Apple introduced last week with only incremental changes seemed to signal that the smartphone industry has entered an era of technological bunny hops.

headline.seo: Despite a Slowdown, Smartphone Advances Are Still Ahead
headline.main: Despite a Slowdown, Smartphone Advances Are Still Ahead
